Did you know 'redrum' spelled backward is 'murder'? The song they sampled is a Brazilian classic, Serenata do Adeus by the legendary composer VinÃ­cius de Moraes. What's crazy is that they chopped it right on 'Adeus!' which means 'Goodbye!' adding even more intensity to the vibe. 'redrum' is also taken from the movie The Shining, where you can hear 'Johnny' played by Jack Nicholson, along with the huff and puff part at the end of the song.
The amount of effects and the production team are worthy of an oscar, the editing is crazy and the time it probably took to record this whole videoclip is what gives us this masterpiece by 21
